did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Minutes of annual meetings of the trustees (1838-1941); quarterly conference minutes (1949-1887); register of probationers (1864-1917); class records (1865-1887); full members (1834-1917); official members (1864-1881); pastoral and statistical records (1863-1868); baptisms (1864-1877); marriages (1863-1881); and secretary's book of the Ladies Aid Society (1879-1893).
